nodes.text: A cloaking device prototype was developed by the Sith Empire on the planet Balmorra, and the refined technology was used to hide the Sith Emperor's space fortress above Dromund Kaas. The prototype was kept in the Balmorran Arms Factory, where Imperial scientists began working on cloaking missiles to create stealth weapons. It was the target of a Jedi mission in 3642 BBY, as Jedi Master Warren Sedoru worked with the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython and crew to recover the device.
